thread.title: Why some iPhone 6S handsets have longer battery life than others - Tech
thread.title_full: Why some iPhone 6S handsets have longer battery life than others - Tech News - Digital Spy

author: Mark Langshaw
title: Why some iPhone 6S handsets have longer battery life than others - Tech
text: Is your iPhone 6S running out of battery long before your mate's? This might by why.It turns out that there are two versions of the A9 processor - the chip that powers the device - in circulation, and one's more energy efficient than the other. Â© Digital Spy Best iPhone 6S deals: Where to buy the Apple iPhone 6S and iPhone 6S PlusApple turned to both TSMC and Samsung to produce the A9 to avoid supply issues at launch, but reports suggest that the latter is lagging behind in the battery stakes.Posts on various internet forums and Chinese websites flagged up by Macrumours indicate that the Samsung chipset was found to offer two hours less runtime when put through its paces by the Geekbench battery test.There's a simple way to check which chip your iPhone 6S is packing - download the Lirum Device Info Lite app from the App Store.If your model number shows up as either N66AP or N71AP, your phone has Samsung innards, while N66MAP or N71MAP models are rocking the allegedly longer-lasting TSMC component.iPhone 6S review: Apple's 3D Touch screen and camera improvements make the best betterWatch the video below for everything you need to know about Apple's latest smartphones: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID);
